list_definition.definition: to invent and prepare a plan of (something) before it is built or made

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A famous architect designed this building.

list_definition.definition: a sketch or plan produced before something is made
style; the way in which something has been made or put together

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It is very modern in design
I don’t like the design of that building.
The curtains have a flower design on them.

list_definition.definition: a plan formed in the mind; (an) intention

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Our holidays coincided by design and not by accident.
